Package camzup.core

Class Curve4

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Curve
camzup.core.Curve4
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICurve, IEntityData, IUtils, java.lang.Iterable<Knot4>
public class Curve4
extends Curve
implements java.lang.Iterable<Knot4>
Implements a composite piecewise cubic Bezier curve. Provides a function to retrieve a point and tangent on a curve from a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .

    • reverse

      public Curve4 reverse()
      Reverses the curve. This is done by reversing the list of knots and swapping the fore- and rear-handle of each knot.
      Returns:
      this curve
      See Also:
      Collections.reverse(List), Knot4.reverse()

    • eval

      public static Vec4 eval​(Curve4 curve, float step, Vec4 coord, Vec4 tangent)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      curve - the curve
      step - the step
      coord - the output coordinate
      tangent - the output tangent
      Returns:
      the coordinate
      See Also:
      Knot4.bezierPoint(Knot4, Knot4, float, Vec4), Knot4.bezierTanUnit(Knot4, Knot4, float, Vec4)

    • fromCatmull

      public static Curve4 fromCatmull​(boolean closedLoop, Vec4[] points, float tightness, Curve4 target)
      Converts a set of points on a Catmull-Rom spline to a Bezier curve. The default tightness is 0.0. There must be at least 4 points in the array.
      Parameters:
      closedLoop - the closed loop flag
      tightness - the curve tightness
      points - the points
      target - the output curve
      Returns:
      the conversion
      See Also:
      Knot4.fromSegCatmull(Vec4, Vec4, Vec4, Vec4, float, Knot4, Knot4), Knot4.mirrorHandlesForward(), Knot4.mirrorHandlesBackward()

    • fromPoints

      public static Curve4 fromPoints​(boolean closedLoop, Vec4[] points, Curve4 target)
      Creates a curve from a series of points. Smoothes the fore- and rear-handles of each knot.
      Parameters:
      closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
      points - the array of points
      target - the output curve
      Returns:
      the curve

      Returns:
      the line

    • random

      public static Curve4 random​(java.util.Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve4 target)
      Creates a random curve. Generates random points, creates a curve from those points, then smoothes the knots' handles.
      Parameters:
      rng - the random number generator
      count - the number of knots to generate
      lowerBound - the lower bound
      upperBound - the upper bound
      closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
      target - the target curve
      Returns:
      the random curve
      See Also:
      Vec4.randomCartesian(Random, float, float, Vec4), fromPoints(boolean, Vec4[], Curve4)

    • random

      Parameters:
      rng - the random number generator
      count - the number of knots to generate

      upperBound - the upper bound

      target - the target curve
